actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the early withdrawal penalty on certain distributions from qualified retirement plans.

summary.text: This bill allows a waiver of the 10% penalty on premature distributions from tax-exempt retirement plans where such distributions do not exceed the excess of $10,000 over aggregate plan distributions during a specified 5-year period.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the early withdrawal penalty on certain distributions from qualified retirement plans.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to waive the early withdrawal penalty on certain distributions from qualified retirement plans.
